name: Death Maze (itch) (Sezor12)
description:
You are lost in a haunted maze, find your way out before "he" finds you.

 Collect items that will help you escape and solve puzzles.

keep your madness bar low and don't get insane.

controls:

 -WASD or arrows for movement.

- [E] to interact with things

-[tab] to open and close inventory.
